page.title: 09Tillingbourne Green-locality
page.content: Tillingbourne Green is in the middle of a large housing estate.It is not far from Orpington or Bromley.The Green has its own parade of shops which serve the local community.The shops around The Green include a post office and hardware store,a chinese take-away,a firm that sells water softeners,a greengrocers,a small supermarket,a hairdressers and a newsagent.If there were a bakery and a chemist it would help to meet the needs of the community.St.Mary Cray station is nearby and the railway line runs through the estate.It is a main line to Victoria Station in London. The Green is used as a play area.It has a few claims to fame.Lady Silkin and Ted Willis used to live in Amherst Drive,one of the first roads to be built.Also,the Red Devils parachute team has landed on The Green.
